recommendations.title: Anomalous Surge Detected
recommendations.message: Unusual spike in anti-regulatory narratives detected across finance-oriented Telegram channels (e.g. @FinWatch). Suggested action: trigger real-time risk scan on related keywords.

recommendations.title: Narrative Manipulation Alert
recommendations.message: Coordinated messaging promoting misinformation around crypto regulations spotted across multiple platforms. Entities involved exhibit cross-channel behavior patterns.

recommendations.title: Potential Insider Risk
recommendations.message: Cluster analysis shows sudden communication increase between mid-level employees and unverified forums. Recommended: review insider activity logs for the affected organization.
